h2.title: Liberating Information From Your HR Documents Is A Snap.

h3.title: Convert Your Data to Any Filetype, Easily.

p.title: Making the data extraction effortless for thousands of companies. Seamlessly export data in numerous formats. Dossier is designed to be used in conjunction with other technologies and applications to produce a significant amount of information about the data extraction effort and performance of the data extraction effort and performance.
